name: SuperDriver
description:
An arcade game in the style of retro games, fast, fun and incredibly challenging game.
You have to rush through dangerous forests, along an incredibly long bridge, where danger is represented not only by oncoming traffic, pits and dangerous jumps, but also by sea inhabitants that are cooling right on your road! But that's not all, there is an endless desert ahead of you, the rocky roads of which hide new dangers, all this awaits you in the incredibly dangerous Super Driver race!

Super Driver - Arcade racing with a top view, forcing you to dodge falling boulders, dead killer whales, crumbling asphalt, jump over springboards, collect fuel, and push the button forward to get to the finish line!



Game Features:
- difficulty
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Responsive controls
